globalEvents.name: Open Crate 1
globalEvents.eventText:
You rummage through the supplies and take whatever seems useful.

Draw a supply card. You gain 1 medpac. Claim this token.

globalEvents.name: Mission Briefing
globalEvents.eventText:
Imperial patrols are everywhere, but you reach the safehouse undetected. Before you can even knock, youre pulled inside.

Lando Calrissian peers back out of the boarded window. “You're clear, but you're late.” The room overflows with curios. “Let me have a look at you. Not Imperials. Not bounty hunters. Good enough; we can move to headquarters. Quickly now!”

{-} Deploy the heroes to the blue highlighted space.
{-} Heroes control <color="red">Lando Calrissian</color> (Charming Smuggler) as an ally.
{-} Doors are locked to Imperial figures.

eventActions.theText: After climbing a construction site and landing on a nearby balcony, you tumble right into a trooper patrol. Security holocams swivel. “They must not know we're here yet,’ Lando mutters, reaching for his blaster. “Take down those holocams!”

entityProperties.name: Holocam 1
entityProperties.theText:
The Imperial holocam monitors the building.

{-} At the end of each round, {D} increases for each Rebel figure in line of sight of 1 or more holocams.
{-} A Rebel figure can interact with a holocam ({K}) to destroy it.
{-} A Rebel figure can attack a holocam (Health: *1*, Defense: None). {P} attacks targeting a holocam require 1 Accuracy. Apply -3 Accuracy to all attacks targeting a holocam.

{-} The Rebels win when all holocams are destroyed.
{-} The Rebels lose when all heroes are wounded.

globalEvents.name: End of Mission - Rebels win
globalEvents.eventText:
“That certainly wasn't the plan, but I'm impressed,” Lando smirks after you elude the last troopers. “Ditching the Imperial Security Bureau isn’t always that easy. I think you and I will get along just fine.”

{-} The Rebels win the mission!
{-} Heroes gain <color="red">Lando Calrissian</color> (Charming Gambler) as an ally.

eventActions.theText: Did you play this mission as part of the "The Bespin Gambit" mini campaign?

globalEvents.name: End of Mission - Rebels lose
globalEvents.eventText:
Reinforcements stream in from every street. Lando ushers you through a nearby cantina. “Forget it, let’s go!” The crowds slow the troopers down just enough i for you to slip away. “I'm burned. Guess we'll have to lay low for a while.”

{-} The Rebels lose the mission.

eventActions.theText: Did you play this mission as part of the "The Bespin Gambit" mini campaign?

globalEvents.name: Campaign Win Yes
globalEvents.eventText:
Back in his element, Lando continues his covert tour of Cloud City's lesser-known streets. Imperial banners fly high over the city, but here you see signs of opposition. Recruitment posters are torn off wals, ISB notices are painted over by Rebel insignias, and more than a few civilians share nods with Lando.

You weave through a market and down into a dimly lit bunker before stopping. Poorly outfitted, battle-worn soldiers welcome you. Lando grabs a swig from a bottle on the table. "Like I said, you*'re late. So there's no time for introductions."

"The ISB has tightened its grip lately, so we leaked some false intelligence to find the gaps. Last night, troopers stormed an abandoned warehouse that we led a contact to believe was a Rebel storehouse. It seems we've got a double agent."

Lando's men supply blueprints to a luxury compound, complete with guard shifts, and the location of the top-floor safe. If anyone knows where the Empire is looking for classified Rebel information, it would be this traitor.

{-} Each hero receives 2 XP.
{-} Heroes receive 300 credits per hero.
{-} The next active mission is “Reclassified”.

globalEvents.name: Campaign Defeat Yes
globalEvents.eventText:
Jostling through the cantina, you get separated from Lando. Before he disappears out a side door, you notice him pause to share words with a man who is having a drink in the corner. Within moments, Lando is gone, the patrons have begun actively impeding the nowtrailing troopers, and the mysterious man ushers you through the kitchen. “I'm the back-up plan. Follow.”

You eventually end your journey in a well-disguised bunker, apparently the base of operations for local Rebels. Your new allies are dejected to learn that Lando won't be back to lead them. They volunteer you as his replacement.

Luckily, the next job is low-risk. Displaced civilians have lost everything. You're charged with delivering pilfered Imperial supplies to nearby refugees. 

{-} Each hero receives 2 XP.
{-} Heroes receive 300 credits per hero.
{-} The next active mission is “Panic in the Streets”.

globalEvents.name: Campaign No
globalEvents.eventText:
{-} Each hero receives 1 XP.
{-} Heroes receive 100 credits per hero.

globalEvents.name: Open Office Door
globalEvents.eventText: The door slides open to reveal a bright office space.

entityProperties.name: Office Door
entityProperties.theText: A brightly lit door leads deeper into the building.

globalEvents.name: Open Safehouse Door
globalEvents.eventText: The door slides open to reveal a dimly lit part of the safehouse. An Ugnaught who was doing repairs and the officer who supervised him look up in surprise, then draw weapons.

entityProperties.name: Safehouse Door
entityProperties.theText: A somewhat dilapidated door leads deeper into the safehouse.

eventActions.theText: How many Rebel figures are within line of sight of 1 or more holocams? (Count Rebel figures with 2 activation tokens as 2 figures.)

globalEvents.name: Security Leader
globalEvents.eventText: An intimidating ISB agent rounds the corner. "Troopers! I thought I had made it clear that if one more uprising gained footing in this city, somebody would be spending time at a black site. Them or you, boys." Reports from the secret prisons are rare, but the troopers’ shudders make the agent's point.
